Name: Denis
description:
This is Denis, a resident of Kitanda-Nyakaina, Buyanja in Rukungiri district. He is a farmer dealing in cattle farming, banana farming, and piggery production.

He is requesting 5,000,000 UGX to improve his banana plantation. Denis has been with UGAFODE for the last 10 years and professes of the economic boost it has granted him and his family. He thanks Kiva for your support towards his economic development.
